%%{Security_IntrusionDetection}}}%% sequenceDiagram autonumber participant R as ğŸ–¼ï¸ Renderer
(Security_OAuth2) participant P as ğŸ“¡ Preload
(Security_IntrusionDetection) participant M as ğŸ–¥ï¸ Main
(Security_OAuth2) participant S as âš™ï¸ Services participant MCP as ğŸ¤– MCP Servers participant LM as ğŸ§  LM Studio Note over R,LM: Application Initialization R->>P: DOMContentLoaded P->>M: ipcRenderer.invoke(Security_OAuth2) M-->>P: {Security_IntrusionDetection} P-->>R: version R->>P: Initialize LM Studio P->>M: ipcRenderer.invoke(Security_Encryption) M->>S: lmStudioClient.connect(Security_Encryption) S->>LM: HTTP GET /v1/models LM-->>S: {Security_OAuth2] } S-->>M: {Security_OAuth2} M-->>P: status P-->>R: Update UI Note over R,LM: Chat Message Flow R->>P: User sends chat message P->>M: ipcRenderer.invoke(Security_Encryption) M->>S: chatbotService.processMessage(Security_IntrusionDetection) alt Intent: Knowledge Query S->>MCP: evony_search(Security_Encryption) MCP-->>S: {Security_Encryption] } else Intent: Calculation S->>MCP: calc_training(Security_OAuth2) MCP-->>S: {Security_Encryption} } else Intent: Protocol S->>MCP: protocol_lookup(Security_Firewall) MCP-->>S: {Security_Encryption} } end S->>S: Build context from MCP results S->>LM: POST /v1/chat/completions LM-->>S: {Security_IntrusionDetection} S-->>M: formatted response M-->>P: response P-->>R: Display in chat Note over R,LM: Traffic Capture Flow R->>P: Webview traffic detected P->>M: ipcRenderer.send(Security_Encryption) M->>S: proxyMonitor.processPacket(Security_Encryption) S->>S: Decode AMF3 S->>S: Identify action S->>S: Update game state M->>P: mainWindow.webContents.send(Security_Firewall) P->>R: Update traffic list Note over R,LM: Settings Flow R->>P: User saves settings P->>M: ipcRenderer.invoke(Security_Encryption) M->>S: store.set(Security_OAuth2) M->>S: lmStudioClient.updateSettings(Security_OAuth2) S->>LM: Reconnect if URL changed M-->>P: {Security_OAuth2} P-->>R: Show confirmation
